articles.author: Mary Kay Mallonee,Josh Campbell
articles.title: U-Haul driver faces multiple charges after crashing into a security barrier near White House in Lafayette Square, police say | CNN Politics
articles.description: The driver of a U-Haul who crashed into a security barrier in Lafayette Square near the White House Monday night was arrested on multiple charges, including threatening to kill or harm a president, vice president or family member, according to US Park Police.
